verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blest are you Lord, God of all creations
Thanks to your goodness this bread
(verse 2 – wine) we offer;
Fruit of the earth, work of our hands
It will become the bread (verse 2 – cup) of life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blessed be God, Blessed be God
Blessed be God forever, Amen
